Monster Rancher 2 on PS3 (GS?)

By Ruby Wish on Tuesday, August 24, 2010 - 07:45 am:

Is a ps1/2 gameshark compatible with the PS3? Wanted
to know before i bought them.
On a side note, is there a full book code for 3, 4,
and evo?


Oh and by the way, hi everybody!

By Shen the Keeper on Saturday, August 28, 2010 - 09:58 am:

Depends on which version of the PS3 you have. If you have one of the earlier versions it should be. If you got a later version that doesn't have the backwards compatibility, you probably can't.

By Elf* on Sunday, September 5, 2010 - 12:23 pm:

They all have backwards compatibility for the PS1, it's the PS2 games that the newer models can't play.
